name: Makassar Paradise
description:
There are so many worth-visiting destinations in Makassar such as: 
+ History trip (Fort Rotterdam, Fort Somba Opu, La Galigo Museum, Mandala Monument)
+ Beach trip to nice island (Samalona island, Kodingareng Keke island, Losari beach, Tanjung Bayam beach), waterfall, Butterfly Museum 
+ Garden trip (Bantimurung, Malino Flower city ) Traditional Culinary (coto, konro, pallu basa, pisang epe,pisang ijo, kapurung ,seafood, mie titi, sarabba), etc. 

I can help you if you have other destinations in Sulawesi like Manado (Bunaken Beach), Bulukumba (Bira Beach), Toraja (Tongkonan art and culture), etc
other destination i cant handle it now mean not available so i only can handle city tour,island and cullinary traditional
